definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to be honest and upright/to have moral integrity

sentences.english: We should get rid of the bad style and keep the good.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該摒棄不良作風，保持優良作風。

sentences.english: We should get rid of the bad style and keep the good.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該摒棄不良作風，保持優良作風。

sentences.english: Some authors even have started  condoning this laid-back approach.
sentences.chinese: 一些作者甚至開始寬恕這種懶散的作風。

sentences.english: IBM has always been a paternalistic employer.
sentences.chinese: 國際商用機器公司一直是個家長作風很強的僱主。

sentences.english: A nonrepresentational style that emphasizes formal values over the representation of subject matter.
sentences.chinese: 強調形式至上，無視內容的一種非寫實主義繪畫作風。

sentences.english: Don't form an undisciplined way of life.
sentences.chinese: 不要養成散漫的生活作風。

sentences.english: Promoting execution is an integrant part of cadres' style building.
sentences.chinese: 提升執行力是幹部作風建設的題中應有之義。

sentences.english: Select colors that match or go with neutrals that fit and style .
sentences.chinese: 選擇匹配的顏色，或到與中立國適合和作風。

sentences.english: Hard work and plain living is a cherished heritage of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦樸素的作風是中國人民的傳家寶。

sentences.english: We had been already used to the style of schedule altered uninterruptedly.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經習慣了這種不斷改變日程的作風。

sentences.english: If Haiti, you'll witness the the ugly side Western paternalism.
sentences.chinese: 而在海地，你會親眼目睹到西方家長作風的醜陋面。

sentences.english: But the developers also fell prey to one-upmanship.
sentences.chinese: 但是開發商也失去了高人一等的作風。

sentences.english: Team building and work style of cadres in terms of A Good.
sentences.chinese: 在班子建設和幹部作風方面創先爭優。
是自由麼？，是家長式作風。

sentences.english: You will be more progressive and effective in day-to-day life style .
sentences.chinese: 你會更進步的和有效的在日常的生活作風。

sentences.english: The typical American approach has something to gain from the British modus operandi, too.
sentences.chinese: 典型的美式作風也可從英式作風中受益。

definition: to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
